title: Dental RCM Specialist Part-Time
job_overview:
How to apply? Please send your email and resume.

Remote Work
USD Compensation 

Skills:
• Detail-oriented
• Fast learner
• Trainable
• Open to feedback
• Bubbly personality
• Dental RCM experience is a must

Work Shift:
Monday through Thursday from 10:00 am to 3:00 pm (EST)

Job Description:
• Verification of benefits
• Enter the EOB into Dentrix
• Generate reports of certain types
• Audit patient records (ensure consent forms are signed and correctly filed)
• Monitor and manage the appointment book
• Regularly review and respond to emails
• Perform insurance verification and eligibility checks
• Review and process voicemail transcripts
• Collect payments (in-office and virtual)
• Manage and follow up on auto-payments
• Prepare for doctor’s appointments (ensure payments and necessary consents are ready)
• Monitor and update in-office membership plan status (active/inactive) and outreach to members as needed
• Perform Dentrix maintenance (clear printer queue to maintain system performance)
• Verify insurance details (ID, SSN, other necessary information)
• Review and manage outstanding balances
• Document the history of special promotions and make notes in patient appointments
